#summary changes in latest version

version 0.9.6-update3:

  * Added supports for Windows XP, Linux 64bit, FreeBSD 32bit/64bit.
  * Added immutable literals
  * Added (srfi :9) (srfi :13) (srfi :14) (srfi :19) (srfi :27) (srfi :38) (srfi :97) (srfi :98) (srfi :27) 
  * Added (slib format)
  * Added (ypsilon concurrent) (ypsilon socket) (ypsilon c-types)
  * Added (tidbits generator) (tidbits remote-repl)
  * Enhance ffi and others (Issue [http://code.google.com/p/ypsilon/issues/detail?id=57&can=1 57] [http://code.google.com/p/ypsilon/issues/detail?id=58&can=1 58] [http://code.google.com/p/ypsilon/issues/detail?id=59&can=1 59] [http://code.google.com/p/ypsilon/issues/detail?id=60&can=1 60])

version 0.9.6-update2:

  * REPL improved its hygiene and exception handling.

version 0.9.6-update1:

  * [http://code.google.com/p/ypsilon/issues/detail?id=38&can=1 Issue 38]: added FreeBSD support to Makefile

version 0.9.6:

  * added `--warning` option
  * `--no-letrec-check` option is deprecated

version 0.9.5-update2:
  * printer speed improved
  * added record-print-nesting-limit
  * rational number arithmetic speed improved
  * [http://code.google.com/p/ypsilon/issues/detail?id=25&can=1 Issue 25]: added new OpenGL example
  * [http://code.google.com/p/ypsilon/issues/detail?id=26&can=1 Issue 26]: added `process` and `process-wait`
  * [http://code.google.com/p/ypsilon/issues/detail?id=27&can=1 Issue 27]: added `system`
  * added `--heap-limit`, `--dump-condition`, and `--no-letrec-check` options 

version 0.9.5-update1:
  * [http://code.google.com/p/ypsilon/issues/detail?id=7&can=1 Issue 7]: added library-extensions
  * [http://code.google.com/p/ypsilon/issues/detail?id=8&can=1 Issue 8]: added uninstall target to Makefile
  * Top-level program syntax will be checked if it have `#!r6rs` before import form
  * [http://code.google.com/p/ypsilon/issues/detail?id=11&can=1 Issue 11]: record printer use write instead of display

  * See [KnownBugs Known bugs in current release] to check more.
